channel.title: Authors on philomath213
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on philomath213

item.description:
I’m Bilal Retiat, a Cyber Security Specialist at Realistic Security, A perpetual learner who enjoys building and breaking things with an appetite for sharing and spreading knowledge.

I assist organizations conduct penetration tests so that they can identify weak spots before an attacker does. When an attacker eventually finds a weak spot first, I collaborate with them to remove the attacker, assess the damage, and remediate the vulnerabilities that allowed the attacker gain access in the first place.
